name: Effect of recording a nondisturbance agreement
text: §514E-20  Effect of recording a nondisturbance agreement.  When a nondisturbance agreement has been executed by the lienholder and recorded, the lienholder, its successors, and anyone who acquires the property through foreclosure or by a deed, assignment, or other transfer in place of foreclosure, shall take the property subject to the rights of the owners. [L 1982, c 186, §8]
